posts.author: Revik
posts.content: How far back can I go with a Mulligan Stick?  I think I made some early skill mistakes on my build that I just hit level 21 on.

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content: You can go back to level 1, but not to level 0.

posts.author: Revik
posts.content: Thanks.  Worked like a charm, like a magical stick charm.
